entry.title: About me（click me）
entry.content:
Hi, My name is Feng ZeZheng and my english name is Michael. I am 20 years old. I was born in Guangzhou. l graduated from Guangwai English School in 2021. Now, l am studying in Macao university of science and technology. My undergraduate major is bachelor of business administration. l am very interested in learning this major and finding lots of business knowledge

I am open-minded, quick in thought and very fond of history. ln my spare time, I have broad interests like many other youngers. l prefer to play different kinds of competitions especially those about basketball and golf. Frequently, l love to travel around the world with my family every summer vacation. During the vacation, l am able to relax myself anthinking of the meaning about life.
